11namespace xdsp::util {
12
22template <typename T>
23inline int sgn(T x) {
24 return (static_cast<T>(0.0) < x) - (x < static_cast<T>(0.0));
25}
26
34inline void fix_underflow(double &d) {
35 typedef std::numeric_limits<float> flt;
36
37 const bool underflow_positive = d > 0.0 && d < flt::min();
38 const bool underflow_negative = d < 0.0 && d > -flt::min();
39
40 if (underflow_positive || underflow_negative) {
41 d = 0.0;
42 }
43}
44
54template <typename df_t>
55inline df_t clamp(df_t x, df_t min = static_cast<df_t>(-1.0),
56 df_t max = static_cast<df_t>(1.0)) {
57 if (x < min) {
58 x = min;
59 }
60 if (x > max) {
61 x = max;
62 }
63
64 return x;
65}
66
76inline float prewarp(const float freq, const float sample_rate) {
77 const float omega_d = (float)consts::TWO_PI * freq;
78 const float omega_a =
79 2.0f * sample_rate * tanf(omega_d / (2.0f * sample_rate));
80
81 return omega_a;
82}
83
87inline double prewarp(const double freq, const double sample_rate) {
88 const double omega_d = consts::TWO_PI * freq;
89 const double fs2 = 2.0 * sample_rate;
90 const double omega_a = fs2 * tan(omega_d / fs2);
91
92 return omega_a;
93}
